ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 13 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS 6D Digital SLR Camera Body with EF 24-105mm L IS USM Lens + <2> PD Laptop/Tablet DSLR Backpack + <3> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card +
<4> Battery Grip for Canon 6D + <5> 77mm 3pc (UV/FLD/CPL) Filter + <6> Spare LP-E6 Battery +
<7> Battery Charger for LP-E6 + <8> Precision Design 58" Tripod + <9> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control +
<10> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <11> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <12> LCD Screen Protectors + <13> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 6D Digital SLR Camera Body with EF 24-105mm L IS USM Lens with 64GB Card + Backpack + Grip + Battery & Charger + Tripod + Kit
